vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.29;
son of: Joktan (H3355);
brother of: Almodad (H0486), Sheleph (H8026), Hazarmaveth (H2700), Jerah (H3392), Hadoram (H1913A), Uzal (H0187), Diklah (H1853), Obal (H5745), Abimael (H0039), Sheba (H7614H), Ophir (H0211) and Havilah (H2341I)
§ Jobab = "a desert"
1) the last in order of the sons of Joktan, a descendant of Shem
2) one of the kings of Edom
3) the king of Madon, located in northern Canaan, and one of the kings who opposed Joshua during the conquest and who were routed at Meron
4) head of a Benjamite house
5) another Benjamite
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Joctán; descendiente de Sem; (b)   rey de Edom; (c)   rey de Madón; (d)   hijo de Saharaim; tribu de Benjamín; (e)   hijo de Elpáal; jefe de familia; tribu de Benjamín
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約巴 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "沙漠"
1) 約坍最小的兒子, 閃的後裔 (代上1:23)
2) 以東諸王之一 (創 36:33)
3) 在迦南北方的瑪頓王, 是安營在米倫水邊要與約書亞爭戰的諸王之一(書 11:1)
4) 便雅憫家的族長 (代上 8:9)
5) 另一位便雅憫人 (代上 8:18)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
约巴 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "沙漠"
1) 约坍最小的儿子, 闪的后裔 (代上1:23)
2) 以东诸王之一 (创 36:33)
3) 在迦南北方的玛顿王, 是安营在米伦水边要与约书亚争战的诸王之一(书 11:1)
4) 便雅悯家的族长 (代上 8:9)
5) 另一位便雅悯人 (代上 8:18)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.33;
son of: Zerah (H2226H)
§ Jobab = "a desert"
1) the last in order of the sons of Joktan, a descendant of Shem
2) one of the kings of Edom
3) the king of Madon, located in northern Canaan, and one of the kings who opposed Joshua during the conquest and who were routed at Meron
4) head of a Benjamite house
5) another Benjamite

2) one of the kings of Edom
3) the king of Madon, located in northern Canaan, and one of the kings who opposed Joshua during the conquest and who were routed at Meron
4) head of a Benjamite house
5) another Benjamite

A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.9;
son of: Shaharaim (H7842) and Hodesh (H2321);
brother of: Zibia (H6644), Mesha (H4331), Malcam (H4445A), Jeuz (H3263), Sachia (H7634), Mirmah (H4821), Abitub (H0036) and Elpaal (H0508)
§ Jobab = "a desert"
1) the last in order of the sons of Joktan, a descendant of Shem
2) one of the kings of Edom
3) the king of Madon, located in northern Canaan, and one of the kings who opposed Joshua during the conquest and who were routed at Meron
4) head of a Benjamite house
5) another Benjamite

son of: Elpaal (H0508);
brother of: Eber (H5677I), Misham (H4936), Shemed (H8106B), Beriah (H1283I), Shema (H8087I), Zebadiah (H2069H), Meshullam (H4918J), Hizki (H2395), Heber (H2268J), Ishmerai (H3461) and Izliah (H3152)
§ Jobab = "a desert"
1) the last in order of the sons of Joktan, a descendant of Shem
2) one of the kings of Edom
3) the king of Madon, located in northern Canaan, and one of the kings who opposed Joshua during the conquest and who were routed at Meron
4) head of a Benjamite house
